      • initEnvironment

        private void initEnvironment()
        Initialisation of menus, fields of UI, set zoom and movement of image.

      • display

        private void display()
        Function to draw fractal in UI. Creates Timeline. If thread is running:
        • checks the size (and updates it if necessary)
        • if there was some changing - abort calculations, then rerun calculations
        • if nothing was changed - check if ForkJoinPool finished his work and draw image; if not - prints "." to log field to indicate processing If thread is idle:
        • checks the size (and updates it if necessary)
        • check if there was some changing - start calculations
        Notifies user his actions.

      • exportConfig

        private void exportConfig​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Save fractal to config file.

      • importConfig

        private void importConfig​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Load fractal from config file (.fct).

      • saveAsPNG

        private void saveAsPNG​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
                throws IOException
        Save image as .png.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • setMenusAndFields

        private void setMenusAndFields()
        Initialisation of menus and fields after import.

      • updateSize

        private void updateSize()
        Function which check if the size of image was changed by user. In case of changing it change the size of Pane.
